title: @KateyKhaos XP Boost?
body: My friend wanted to get to level 25 to get to team builder so he bought an xp boost and i agreed to play with him to get him the two level's and now that the sever's are down for 4-6 hours does that xp boost still tick down or what happens with that?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

As Nasreth said, submitting a support ticket is the best bet. 

If the boost is based off wins, nothing will happen during the downtime. However, if it's timed, it would continue to keep ticking.
I'd make a support ticket. They'll probably adjust the xp boost, refresh it, or refund for your friend.
